msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: Regularly cut at the left and right hand sides; the papyrus is badly broken: at the top and lost the column's number, the end of the first lines and at the bottom. No restoration is needed. (MA)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. (MA)

origin.origPlace: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt
origin.persName: Kastor slave of Aphrodous, daughter of Dios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 181)
Leonides, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 184)
Petheus, son of Hatres (Ptolemaios Panpin) (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 201)
Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 194)
Didymion, son of Petheus the elder, mother Tasoucharion (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 161)
Anoubas, son of Horos, grandson of Anoubas, mother Tephros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 151)
Herakles, son of Petaus, grandson Orsenouphis, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 168)
Petheus the brother (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Karanos, son of Orsenouphis, grandson of Imouthes, mother Tapetsiris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 180)
Achillas, son of Heron, grandson of Orsenouphis, mother Didyme (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Pakysis, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Pakysis, mother Tepheros (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 196)
Paoueites, son of Petheus, Phasis, mother Tapetheus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 197)
Achillas, son of Phaesis, grandson of Zenas, mother Tasigonis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 158)
Horos, son of Menandros, grandson of Anchophis, mother Soeris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 250)
Phaesis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Polyndikos, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 246)
Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 249)
Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 213)
Heron, son Ptolemaios, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Heras (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 171)
Sarapion slave of Syros, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Thaisas (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Loukios Longinus Gemellus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 185)
Pasoxis, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Panther, mother Taseus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 199)
Petheus, son of Kanis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)
Sarapion, son Kames, grandson of Heras, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Markus Anthestis Gemellus (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 186)
Petheus, son of Petesouchos, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkateis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 203)
Charidemos, son of Petoraipis, grandson of Onnophris, mother Thaesis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 248)
Sarapion, son of Phasis, grandson of Keras, mother Helene (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 225)
Onnophris, son Petheus, grandson of Teos, mother Segathis (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 192)
Petheus, son of Pasoknopaios (see P.Mich. IV/2, p. 202)

provenance.p: Karanis, Herakleidou meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.
